body:
Hi everyone! I am totally new at grasshopper, honeybee and ladybug :)  I've been following Mostapha Sadeghipour Roudsari's youtube tutorials, and I have a problem with my test points - I believe that the wrong data is being shown. I know that I have connected the 'illuminance files' from RunDaylightAnalysis to the '_results files' of ReadRADResults - which I think is incorrect as I should be connecting RAD files to it instead. I think that these RAD files should be within the 'radGeoFiles' from RunDaylightAnalysis, but when connecting these together I obtain a rederror message saying 'Solution exception: need more than 1 value to unpack'.[
](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topic/listForContributor?user=2o71qkfqc6voq) I have updated all components and re-loaded the specific components.  I really appreciate your help - thanks in advance! :)  /Sara
topic: Problem with showing RAD files results in test points

replies.body:
Sara,

See working file.

Needed a major updating, some replacements. But basically was almost there.

-A.

Hi Abraham,

Thanks so much for your help! 

May I ask what you specifically replaced in order to debug it myself another time in the future? :) 



/Sara

Hi Abraham, Unfortunately, I do not think the problem is solved :/  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/b*u3sBO-oVXGaLhNWqiQ-FYIvbeH439ZQH02juBOPTywUfcWNG2k4w7kAk-rIwu-YG9u9E-ut8r-aUFqGVZ0JR*oC-jZKrk*/ScreenShot20160331at11.02.55AM.png)

The file you attached is the same one as you sent on your first comment.

Please use the one i sent and then let the forum know if there is indeed a problem.



As for what i replaced: basically the update process, using the LB_HB updaters, is pretty smooth. Still, there remain some components that changed the number of input/output items and there is need to reinsert them manually. Can't recall from memory which ones i reinserted (legendPar, recolorMesh, ...).

-A.
